about_the_game:
We often feel anxious and burned out from our fast-paced, over-stimulated lives.

Discover peace and tranquility with Wanderness, a new type of walking sim that takes you through serene natural landscapes. As you wander, capture stunning moments with your trusty camera and immerse yourself in a soothing, zen-inspired world that calms your mind and eases anxiety. Reconnect with the beauty of nature and find your center, one peaceful step at a time.

Features

  • Explore a stunning world crafted from real 360-degree photographs.

  • Relaxing and uplifting soundscape that transports you to serenity and coziness.

  • No timers, no crafting, and no pressure. Just wander and capture photos at your own pace.

  • Experience a full day cycle as the landscape gracefully transforms from dawn to dusk and into night.
